pages.title: Discord
pages.text: Get help or discuss the mod in our Discord server in the #corvus channel

pages.title: Bug Reports
pages.text: Please post any bugs you find on the issue tracker

pages.title: Curseforge
pages.text: The Curseforge page is the ONLY place to download this mod. Check it out for some extra information!

pages.title: Github
pages.text: This mod is open source - check it out!
